Hi Shibu 

 

Hope all is well. 

 

Can you please share with us the renewed property all risk and business interpretation insurance document for Dubai Mall boutique.

Attached one is expired , and we need them urgently for permit applications.

 

Many Thanks, 

 

Vidya SHEKAR

Christian Dior Parfums
Design District, Building 11, 2nd Floor, Dubai 

Mob. : +971 54 4717126
